review.title: “The company where the employees are getting cheated by the management”
review.pros: Pros – If you are a fresher igrandee is the best place to learn. You can get working experience in all technologies as they never let you to get experience in particular domain
review.cons: Cons – You cant even expect a single penny from the management as salary. its not the place for the experienced guys. then you must learn to live in dream. you never get closer to your dream at all. just quit once you got your skill up. Management will never give any certificates if you leave from igrandee.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Just remember those who worked day and night for you. But you gave the result as to fire them for nothing.
